featuredImage.contentDescription: An image of a natural spring. There is a waterfall in the foreground, spilling from the spring. Moss covered rocks are visible in the background, behind steam in the air, illuminated by rays of sunshine piercing through a canopy of trees above.

stories.title: Kein Halt am Mars [No stop at Mars] - A2

featuredImage.contentDescription: An astronaut stands, with the red ground of Phobos and the red planet Mars reflected in the visor of their space suit.

stories.title: Der leere Karneval [The empty carnival] - A2

featuredImage.contentDescription: An empty street with colourful buntings and decorations hanging above.

stories.title: Die winzigen Wikinger von Berlin [The tiny Vikings of Berlin] - A2

featuredImage.contentDescription: Several tiny Vikings in viking row boats on the Spree river in Berlin.

stories.title: Der Tag, an dem Magie Wirklichkeit wurde [The day magic became reality] - A2

featuredImage.contentDescription: Four children and a dog holding sparkling wands. The children are smiling and three of them are floating in the air.
A seedling sprouting from the ground.

stories.title: Geisterflüstern und Herzschläge [Ghostly whispers and heartbeats] - A2

featuredImage.contentDescription: A large gothic style house. Lightning flashes in the background.
